column4: Panpo is a master of the elements that surround him. By harnessing the elements around him, he can slow, blind, heal, protect, enhance, inflict minor damage. He is a supporting character, and uses these resources: Energy, Mana, Will, Reagent, and Coin.
column10: Panpo is more of an offensive character with ability to summon a plant fiend familiar (cost one action point, begins the game with familiar already), and the familiar will last until killed, dismissed, or a different one is summoned. Panpo’s familiars cannot die but do require an action point to resummon if lost. Panpo has basic damage and limited support spells, and uses these resources: Energy, Mana, Will, Reagent, and Coin. Panpo and his Familiar share actions (2 total)

column3: Panpo can imbue life into any object, corpse, or plant. Only usable once, if used on a non player character; Panpo will be able to direct the creature for one full turn before it crumbles. This is a minor storytelling ability.

column4: Eegan and Abbo are cunning and quick footed. They are both highly maneuverable and seem to always land on their feet. Eegan is renown for her acrobatics and fluid movements (second only to Abbo’s), while she is keen with a throwing ability, she mostly relies on traps and out maneuvering and outlasting her foes. Abbo is her feline familiar and will follow anywhere Eegan goes, Abbo is a master rogue and can stealthily enter and exit most any environment without notice, he also has a relatively high attack, especially when surprise attacking. This is a mixed support to high offensive role
column10: Eegan is a natural speaker and is gifted with silver speech. With just a few words she can inspire her party, and confuse her enemy, has powerful persuasions, has minor spell casting and healing abilities. Abbo is her feline familiar and will follow anywhere Eegan goes, Abbo is a master rogue and can stealthily enter and exit most any environment without notice, he also has a relatively high attack, especially when surprise attacking. Abbo will listen to the request of any friendly team member, if they are charismatic enough to persuade him. Highly supportive role.
